citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
The most recent IACUC minutes reviewed at time of the inspection are dated March 16. 2023. The Institutional Official
stated a semi annual facility inspection was conducted in August 2023 ,however the IACUC had not met since March
2023 . This is over the 6 month time frame required for a meeting . A required function of the IACUC is to meet at least
once very 6 months to review the research facilities program for humane care and use of animals.
CORRECT BY : 1/12/2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the Institutional Official .
n

narrative:
2.31(c)(1) 
   
Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC). 
The most recent IACUC minutes reviewed at time of the inspection are dated March 16. 2023. The Institutional Official 
stated a semi annual facility inspection was conducted in August 2023 ,however the IACUC had not met since March 
2023 . This is over the 6 month time frame required for a meeting . A required function of the IACUC is to meet at least 
once very 6 months to review the research facilities program for humane care and use of animals. 
CORRECT BY : 1/12/2024 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the Institutional Official . 
 
 n
